column3: i inquired. i was told that they had texted me twice already--this is demonstrably false.  i asked them to call my phone using the number i gave them originally.  the young lady was reluctant to do it
column5: and my phone rang.   they clearly had the right number.   an employee in an orange shirt  said "don't worry
column6: you are now at the top of the list."  i waited another ten minutes
column7: and after seeing a number of folks being seated
column8: i inquired again.   they claimed to have texted me again.  (my cell phone records show that is not the case.) then
column9: the guy in the orange shirt said that they thought that i left.  (if one story doesn't work
